title: Spin(7) holonomy manifold and Superconnection
abstract: We discuss the higher dimensional generalization of gravitational instantons by using volume-preserving vector fields. We give special attention to the case of 8-dimensions and present a new construction of the Ricci flat metric with holonomy in Spin(7). An example of the metric is explicitly given. Further it is shown that our formulation has a natural interpretation in the Chern-Simons theory written by the language of superconnections.
